answers.answer: Hi, Thank you very much for your question. Your whole body vibration symptoms could be related to diabetes, thyroid dysfunction, Vitamin B complex deficiency, neurological disorder or if you are any vibration jobs (like drilling etc). Nerve studies and nerve test may be helpful to further evaluate the condition. I would recommend evaluating the possibilities here with the help of a doctor. Further referral to a neurologist or endocrinologist may be required to assess the condition. Hope this information proves helpful to you.
i can feel that my stomach is vibrating?and it feels like there tickling inside my stomach..why is that so?

question: what is the sensation called when the torso vibrates and you hear a vibrating sound while in the sitting position?
title: neurology
